CityGML is an open standardised data model and exchange format to store digital 3D models of cities and landscapes. It is implemented as an application schema for GML3, and it is an official international standards of the OGC.

Download documentation (v2.0) Download schemas (v2.0)

About StandardName

The description of your awesome standard will be displayed in the about section of your site. Here you can enter what you like as long as it makes sense as an about section for the Standard for which this site is built for.
